title: Interactive Design Based on Learning Management Systems (LMS) and Learning Analytics Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A customized mathematics education course for professionals, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with continuous learning improvement through formative assessment-centered feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can identify their interaction patterns through LMS data analysis and incorporate them into learning strategies
Learners enhance their ability to solve complex mathematical problems through qualitative discussions with peers in project-based activities
Learners can continuously monitor and improve learning outcomes through formative assessments utilizing LMS data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
